vpy.standard.standard module¶

class vpy.standard.standard.Standard(orgdoc, name)[source]¶

Bases: vpy.document.Document

Standard Class. Needs access to Constants, CalibrationObjects and measurement values. Provides the normals main measurand e.g. calibration pressure
